name: Facebook Radius v1.1
description: Hello here's a little CSS I made for facebook to change pictures to a 100% radius with a Chat style like on Facebook Home Notification
additional_info:
UPDATE : changed the links on the message box to RED-Orange, so that you can clearly see it
UPDATE 13/06 : some hover style on the bluebar
UPDATE 21/08 : No more Hover style on the graph search bar
               Changed the background-image to BASE64 for more stability to the project.
